website_summaries.verdict: An excellent and accurate addition to an existing Batman figure collection.
pros: Figure comes with 4 interchangeable hands, whip, pet cat, and a unique base
An accurate depiction of Catwoman from The New Batman Adventures
Joints articulate to create a variety of poses
cons: Figure is quite thin, you may need to handle with care

customer_reviews.title: Be gentle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Catwoman for a batmobile and she fits purrfectly. She feels a bit fragile, like I could just squish her. But pretty awesome Catwoman.
customer_reviews.author: Kouhei-son

customer_reviews.title: Catwoman
customer_reviews.text: The figure is nice. It's for adult collectors so it's delicate. Comes with plenty accessories and a stand to prop her up.
customer_reviews.author: Juan gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: The Bats Cat
customer_reviews.text: Great looking figure but due to ber petite size feels like she could very easily break
customer_reviews.author: Fanwithoutfear67

customer_reviews.title: Big Catwoman fan
customer_reviews.text: I like Catwoman in the Batman TAS. This figure is styled after Catwoman in the last season. It looks really good better then the earlier figures that came out with the same look.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: No issues
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for an avid collector. Arrived on time and as described.
customer_reviews.author: SilverEclectic1

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for all Batman fans!
customer_reviews.text: If you're a catwoman... get this one for your collection. It's made just like the new animated show and looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Angel C.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking figure!
customer_reviews.text: The figure looks just like Catwoman from the show! Lots of different hands and great accessories. Comes with a stand because the figure can't stand by itself, due to the top heavy design from the show.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great figure. Looks just like Catwoman in the show, very well made
customer_reviews.author: Mister E

customer_reviews.title: 5 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a collector and purchase this for my bro who was extremely excited. Great for any DC and or Catwoman collector.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with this item. It arrived on time and with no flaws. I love the Batman the Animated Series/New Adventures of Batman and Robin. I really like the way that the animators changed up some of the characters look/design.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Jones

product_meta.title: DC Collectibles The New Batman Adventures Catwoman Action Figure
product_meta.description: Based on the designs from the hit cartoon series the new Batman adventures Comes One of the dark Knight's greatest foes-andd allies-cat womann! This 6" Figure comes with interchangeable hands, bola whip and pet cat accessories, as well as a display base and episode-specific accessories!.
feature_bullets: Includes bola whip and pet cat accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars58 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
